Dwarka, Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 28th August, 2012 PQLICY MATERS-ADMINISTRATIONFINANCE (90/2012) (Decision taken on FileNo NHAILL 1035/01[2009-HR-UL Sub: Delegation of Power to Chairman, Members and other officers of the NHAI Modification of power for Authorization of Tour of Regional Officers: In partial modification of earlier Administration/Finance Policy Circulars No.57/2009 and No_ 72/201 1 dated 07.09.2009 and 08.09.2011 respectively, it has been decided that Delegation of Powers in respect of approval of the tour programmes of Regional Officers will be as follows: Designalion of Recommending Approving Officers Otticer Authority Regional Officers Member Chairman concerned 2 Henceforth, all Regional Officers are asked to obtain approval of their tour programme accordingly. 3 This issues with trie approval of Chairman: (V.K Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord./LA) AlLofficers and employees of_HQ/ZO[ROS[PIUs[CMUs/Site Qiiices THnt NHAL New 28 To,
